name: lhc-simulator
description: 粒子对撞机模拟程序 - 基于ATLAS框架

scripts.build:backend: cd backend && mkdir -p build && cd build && cmake .. && make
scripts.clean:frontend: cd frontend && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules) && (if exist package-lock.json del /f /q package-lock.json) && npm cache clean --force
scripts.reinstall:frontend: npm run clean:frontend && npm run install:frontend
